# about
I study theoretical physics at the [Institute of Mathematical Sciences](http://www.imsc.res.in) in Chennai.

Here is an example MathJax inline rendering \\( 1/x^{2} \\), and here is a block rendering: 
\\[ \frac{1}{n^{2}} \\]
